messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

https://codereview.appspot.com/10401046/diff/1/doc/gccgo_install.html
File doc/gccgo_install.html (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/10401046/diff/1/doc/gccgo_install.html#newcode37
doc/gccgo_install.html:37: include the last few changes to the Go 1 libraries.  The GCC 4.7.1
this sentence is in the future tense; should be past tense. or perhaps be deleted.

https://codereview.appspot.com/10401046/diff/1/doc/gccgo_install.html#newcode38
doc/gccgo_install.html:38: includes a complete Go 1 compiler and libraries.
s/^/release/

PTAL

https://codereview.appspot.com/10401046/diff/1/doc/gccgo_install.html
File doc/gccgo_install.html (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/10401046/diff/1/doc/gccgo_install.html#newcode37
doc/gccgo_install.html:37: include the last few changes to the Go 1 libraries.  The GCC 4.7.1
On 2013/06/20 20:58:39, r wrote:
> this sentence is in the future tense; should be past tense. or perhaps be
> deleted.

Simplified the paragraph, I guess nobody cares about 4.7.0 vs. 4.7.1 any more.

https://codereview.appspot.com/10401046/diff/1/doc/gccgo_install.html#newcode38
doc/gccgo_install.html:38: includes a complete Go 1 compiler and libraries.
On 2013/06/20 20:58:39, r wrote:
> s/^/release/

Done.

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/10401046/diff/12001/doc/gccgo_install.html
File doc/gccgo_install.html (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/10401046/diff/12001/doc/gccgo_install.html#newcode403
doc/gccgo_install.html:403: a struct.  For example, these functions have roughly equivalent:
s/have/are/
or
s/:/ implementations:/

https://codereview.appspot.com/10401046/diff/12001/doc/gccgo_install.html#newcode467
doc/gccgo_install.html:467: Note that if the C function can block, e.g. in a call
s/e.g./such as/

https://codereview.appspot.com/10401046/diff/12001/doc/gccgo_install.html
File doc/gccgo_install.html (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/10401046/diff/12001/doc/gccgo_install.html#newcode403
doc/gccgo_install.html:403: a struct.  For example, these functions have roughly equivalent:
On 2013/06/20 21:08:29, r wrote:
> s/have/are/
> or
> s/:/ implementations:/

Done.

https://codereview.appspot.com/10401046/diff/12001/doc/gccgo_install.html#newcode467
doc/gccgo_install.html:467: Note that if the C function can block, e.g. in a call
On 2013/06/20 21:08:29, r wrote:
> s/e.g./such as/

Done.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a8be19998f6c ***

doc: update gccgo docs

subject: code review 10401046: doc: update gccgo docs
